title: EVOLUTION: Book Two of The Devolution Trilogy

Terrorists have launched a bioweapon in the Middle East, thousands are dying of a horrifying virus with no cure, and Dolan is the key to preventing more attacks. I wanted to create a story where the depth and complexity of the main character, Michael Dolan, were just as compelling and important as the plot. As spy thrillers go, DEVOLUTION, EVOLUTION, and REVELATION have everything readers of the genre crave: action, suspense, cliffhangers and mystery.
